Text.Page:
Jalmaraks were faeries charged with defending the Staff of Isren. Something changed, though, and they turned on the other fey creatures.

The faerie guardians are now called unseelie, and they follow Sinarl as their regent.

To break their hold on Darkquaver Woods, we need you to destroy the jalmarak thrashers.
Their deaths are a loss to the fey, but the jalmaraks chose their fate. Thanks to you, we might yet reclaim these ancient lands.
